website_summaries.verdict: All-season low-profile high performance tires with a sporty edge.
pros: Great cornering performance thanks to large outside shoulder blocks
Hydroplaning resistance and enhanced braking thanks to high-angle grooves
Grippy and secure sport tire performance for everyday use
cons: Ideal street tires that may not be suitable for off-road conditions

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tires! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this tires. I immediately can feel the smoothness while driving. The handling it’s so easy and comfortable. I’ll be doing mostly freeway and steer driving in a dry sunny california weather. I’ll revise this once winter (rainy conditions) are around.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Huezo

customer_reviews.title: Ride Handling and they Look awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Like these Tires a lot! Put them on a new truck I just bought and love the way it handles. Been in some hard Rain and I feel Very Sure Footed with them No Hydroplaning and they are Quiet. Great choice glad I bought them!!
customer_reviews.author: KSUDADEO

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great Tire
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this tire and how it handles on the road. Keeps my family and me safe! Does well in Sand on the Beach, Dirt Roads, Water and obviously pavement :-)
customer_reviews.author: Zeb Reardon

customer_reviews.title: Best tire for the price
customer_reviews.text: These tires are great! Look aggressive and ride extremely smooth. I had Nexxans on my truck and they had a loud roar. It was really nice to have a smooth and quite ride again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Wet Traction and Quiet Road Manners
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our 2015 Suburban tires and took a 900 mile roadtrip first thing. These have a great tread and handle very well in the rain. Very quiet and hopefully they wear well, I am glad we choose these.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Jarriel

customer_reviews.title: 2020 Titan 4x4
customer_reviews.text: A lot of meat on this tire. Tested in dry and Wet slippery conditions and it felt very safe. Exactly what I was looking for. Researched a lot for an all season with good rainy and snow conditions performance and the reviews on this one were accurate. Will test in snow in a month or two. No road noise a plus as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Sticky tires.
customer_reviews.text: Installed these tires on a set of KMC Skitch Black Satin wheels and what a difference the combo made to my 2013 F-150. The truck has been heavily modified, but still handled like a truck. These tires made it stick like a beast. Highly recommended if you're driving on the street.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ramsdell

customer_reviews.title: Honest review.
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my 2016 Tahoe. Great tires so far, awesome grip and handles the rain very well. Will update after a few thousand miles.
customer_reviews.author: ZF

customer_reviews.title: Love the grip and tread pattern
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tires recently. Love the grip and tread pattern. Do they come with any warranty?
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gaddis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the tread and performance of these tires. Handles the road very good.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Damron

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. They look great on my Cadillac Escalade Ext! I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Alfred McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Looked awesome on my Escalade
customer_reviews.text: 'Looked awesome on my Escalade! Also noticed much better handling and steering with these. A lot stickier than my old tires. Super fast shipping as well! Thanks! '''
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice tires great value for a brand name tire!!!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was quick and easy delivered right to the Chevy store!!!! 2018 Chevy Suburban
customer_reviews.author: thomas thorndike

customer_reviews.title: Best buy and they look good
customer_reviews.text: It just snowed where i live so far so good
customer_reviews.author: carlo hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good riding tires on road
customer_reviews.text: Tires handle very well on sharp curves for an SUV.
customer_reviews.author: james t voltz

customer_reviews.title: Great Tires at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: GREAT TIRES at a great price. Ordered these for my daughter in laws SUV, due to a small mishap my wife had while driving it. (That's a whole other story though). Bought them because that is what they had on the vehicle and wanted them to match.Son likes them and so does daughter in law, so all is well.
customer_reviews.author: RLD 1427Top Contributor: Welding

customer_reviews.title: Toyo doesn’t do warranty's
customer_reviews.text: Only last 8,000 mailed then bubble came with out hit a curbside, then seller and toyo doesn’t cover that !! Very disappointed with toyo tires
customer_reviews.author: Vsa trucking

product_meta.title: Toyo Proxes S/T All- Season Radial Tire-285/45R22 114V
product_meta.description: Toyo Proxes S/T All- Season Radial Tire-285/45R22 114V
feature_bullets: LARGE OUTSIDE SHOULDER BLOCKS - Confident cornering performance
WIDE CIRCUMFERENTIAL GROOVES - Rapid water evacuation
HIGH ANGLE LUG GROOVES - Improved hydroplaning resistance and enhanced braking performance
This product is not for sale in the state of Arkansas
